data.title: My Name in Chinese Characters on a Custom Handmade Wall Scroll
data.meta_description: I can make a beautiful Chinese calligraphy wall scroll with your personal name written on it. Custom made and delivered in a few weeks.
data.text:
Your Name in Chinese Characters on a Wall Scroll

If you've ever wanted your name written in Chinese Calligraphy, this is the place...

Depending on the number of Chinese characters needed to write your name, wall scrolls range in price from $29.88 to $59.88 for economy calligraphy. For $40 more, you can have a master calligrapher create your masterpiece.

All names are transliterated, which means they are designed to sound roughly the same using Mandarin Chinese sounds and characters. If your name has a direct meaning, we can translate your name instead. Examples of names that can be translated, instead of transliterated include "Summer", "Joy" or "Angel".

If you don't find your name below, just email me at help@orientaloutpost.com

More names are added each week - Just email me at help@orientaloutpost.com if you want yours added!

There are 10955 names listed below - hopefully one of them is yours...

T

thibault

Don't worry if your name in not on any of these lists. We can custom transliterate virtually any name into Chinese.

Please just email me at help@orientaloutpost.com if you need your name transliterated. If you name is not common, please give me some clues as to how it is pronounced phonetically.

This page is often searched for as:

Names in Chinese Letters

...Though technically, the term "Chinese letters" is incorrect, as they are ideograms, glyph, symbols, or characters, but not letters.
